original_title: Mariah Carey: The Adventures Of Mimi
overview: Mariah Carey, the top-selling female artist of all time with sales of over 160 million units worldwide, took her newest show on the road in 2006 for the first time in more than three years. The Adventures of Mimi, her most successful tour ever, shaped up to be a grand celebration, drawing on songs—many performed for the first time ever—from her 15-year career.
title: Mariah Carey: The Adventures Of Mimi
